remarks: Function value of the algebraic scalars function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Mar-2015.)
statement:
asclfval.a $e |- A = ( algSc ` W ) $.
asclfval.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
asclfval.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
asclfval.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
asclfval.o $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` W ) $.
asclfval $p |- A = ( x e. K |-> ( x .x. .1. ) ) $.
$d .1. x $.
$d .x. x $.
$d K x $.
$d W x $.
